title: "With Drive Pilot, Mercedes accelerates on self-driving vehicles"
excerpt: "Mercedes-Benz will officially launch its Drive Pilot automated driving system on its S-Class and EQS, for now in Germany only. This is the world's first commercialised Level 3 system, a further step towards automation on vehicles."
